Input

The text to generate audio for. The maximum length is 4096 characters.

public string Input { get; set; }

ResponseFormat

The default response format is "mp3", but other formats are available in TextToSpeechRequest.ResponseFormats. See https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/text-to-speech/supported-output-formats

Declaration
[JsonProperty("response_format", DefaultValueHandling = DefaultValueHandling.Ignore)]
public string ResponseFormat { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String
| Improve this Doc View Source

Speed

The speed of the generated audio. Select a value from 0.25 to 4.0. 1.0 is the default.

Declaration
[JsonProperty("speed", DefaultValueHandling = DefaultValueHandling.Ignore)]
public double? Speed { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Nullable<System.Double>
| Improve this Doc View Source

Voice

The voice to use when generating the audio. Supported voices can be found in TextToSpeechRequest.Voices.

[JsonProperty("voice")]
public string Voice { get; set; }
